talks.name: Michael Allen
talks.title: KAINOSS
talks.description: An impassioned plea to build Open Source for fun and profit.
talks.biography: Michael is working as a tech lead with land registry building a service to sign a digital mortgage deed online.

talks.name: Szymon Ramczykowski
talks.title: Exploratory testing
talks.description: How exploratory testing can improve your project.
talks.biography: Szymon is a senior test engineer in Kainos working on Government digital.
